title: How to Make Walnut Pate

steps.headline: Place the walnuts, parsley, onion, and garlic clove into the food processor.
Pour in the lemon juice and a little olive oil.
Process.
steps.description: If it needs more oil, add a top up. Process until of a smooth consistency.

steps.headline: Remove and place in a bowl for serving.
Put the ingredients into the food processor.
Process until smooth.
steps.description: If needed, add more water to ensure a smooth paste.

steps.headline: Transfer to a serving dish.
steps.description: Add crackers or toast pieces for eating with.

text: Walnut and Parsley Pâté Place the walnuts, parsley, onion, and garlic clove into the food processor.  Pour in the lemon juice and a little olive oil.  Process. If it needs more oil, add a top up. Process until of a smooth consistency. Remove and place in a bowl for serving.  Sundried Tomatoes and Parsley Pâté Put the ingredients into the food processor. Add 2 tablespoons of water. Process until smooth. If needed, add more water to ensure a smooth paste. Transfer to a serving dish. Add crackers or toast pieces for eating with.
